title: Google\Cloud\AccessApproval\V1\ApprovalRequest
name: ApprovalRequest
description:
A request for the customer to approve access to a resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.accessapproval.v1.ApprovalRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The resource name of the request. Format is "{projects|folders|organizations}/{id}/approvalRequests/{approval_request}".

params.name: data.requested_resource_name
params.description: The resource for which approval is being requested. The format of the resource name is defined at https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/resource_names. The resource name here may either be a "full" resource name (e.g. "//library.googleapis.com/shelves/shelf1/books/book2") or a "relative" resource name (e.g. "shelves/shelf1/books/book2") as described in the resource name specification.

params.name: data.requested_resource_properties
params.description: Properties related to the resource represented by requested_resource_name.

params.name: data.requested_reason
params.description: The justification for which approval is being requested.

params.name: data.requested_locations
params.description: The locations for which approval is being requested.

params.name: data.request_time
params.description: The time at which approval was requested.

params.name: data.requested_expiration
params.description: The requested expiration for the approval. If the request is approved, access will be granted from the time of approval until the expiration time.
